job_description:
Review and analyze client-specific requirements and scope of projects/tasks to ensure an accurate understanding of deliverable requirements and acceptance criteria.
Define test scenarios, create test plans, and participate in the definition and execution of manual and/or automated system test scripts.
Executing the appropriate test cases, including writing test plans, scenarios, and test cases, mining and manipulating test data.
Isolate, replicate, and report defects and retesting of defects through resolution.
Collaborate with project team resources to understand and prioritize testing efforts.
Execute project deliverables and tasks on time and on budget to support profitable and high-quality operations service delivery.
Typically assigned to multiple projects, ranging from simple to moderate complexity, or to a single project of high complexity.
Assist in the analysis of current processes and propose recommendations for process improvements.
Perform other related duties as assigned.
job_requirements:
22-25 years old and have at least 1 year of experience in website or software testing.
Basic knowledge in e-commerce, pre-intermediate English level (reading and writing skills), and computer literacy.
Experience working in an Agile/Scrum or having knowledge of JavaScript, PHP, and Magento is a plus.
Analytical, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills.
Strong interpersonal skills to collaborate with customers and internal cross-functional teams.
Ability to quickly learn new technologies, systems, and processes.
Self-motivated, well-organized, and with strict attention to detail.
Having an infectious can-do attitude inspires others and encourages great performance in a fast-moving environment.
Own or potentially develop BSS core values: Passion, Responsibility, Integrity, Can-do attitude, Joy, Respect.
job_benefits:
Salary: 10M - 15M (review every 6 months).
Working in one of the leading Magento companies in Vietnam, which is the first to be both Select
Extension Builder and Business Solution Partner of Magento, with nearly 100% foreign customers.
Daily implement professional testing tools (Browserstack, Jmeter, Internal bug logging system...)
Coverage of ISTQB certification fee and other advanced testing courses.
Youthful and dynamic working environments with many clubs: running, football, board games...
Convenient office at the 14th, 18th, 19th, and 20th floors with scenic views. Tea, coffee, and drinks are always available at the office.
The State statutory holidays and collective activities (team building, picnics, travel...) are organized by the Company.
Other benefits are according to the provisions of the Company and the Labor Code.

job_description:
CompaxDigital is a multinational software company that creates cloud-based enterprise software solutions covering areas of Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Business Support System (BSS), and Order-To-Cash process. We are headquartered in Vienna, Austria, with multiple office locations in Germany, Switzerland, USA, Taiwan, South Korea, and Singapore. Our clients are first-tier organizations operating in Telco, IoT, Media, and Tolling.
We live a start-up like culture. Our organizational structure is flat, centering around the engineers with no middle management. You are encouraged to contribute ideas towards the development of the projects as well as the company. Your career path development lies in your hands.
To further strengthen our engineering teams, we are seeking passionate Java software developers for our new office in Hanoi, Vietnam. You will work in international, agile, and self-organizing teams from different locations to deliver best-in-class software solutions for our clients.
Your role
You and your colleagues in a Scrum team accompany our client along the entire software lifecycle from requirements analysis to implementation, deployment, and maintenance.
Regular customer exchange in the context of the daily Scrum meetings.
Extend and customize our in-house software product to suit customer needs.
Depending on your skills and preferences, you can choose to focus on different areas: backend, frontend, performance tuning, migration, security, or DevOps.
Design and implement scalable APIs for the integration of third-party systems.
Among others, you will work with the following technology stack:
Programming languages: Java, SQL, PL/SQL, PL/pgSQL, JavaScript, Typescript.
Databases / Data stores: PostgreSQL, Oracle, Elasticsearch, Kafka, Redis.
Application Servers: Tomcat, Wildfly.
Frameworks: Spring/Spring Boot, JSF, JPA/Hibernate, React.js, Angular, Next.js, Node.js.
CI/CD: Gitlab, Jenkins, in-house system, Kubernetes.
job_requirements:
Your qualifications and skills
Bachelor’s degree (or higher) in Computer Science or related technological fields.
Several years of professional experience as a software developer.
Proficiency in Java, object-oriented programming and SQL.
Experience or familiarity with our technology stack.
Experience with cloud technologies and building scalable software is a plus.
Team player and ability to work without supervision.
Strong problem-solving skills, willingness to learn and adapt.
Fluent written and spoken English (IELTS 7.0).
job_benefits:
Benefits
Negotiable salary. Depending on your qualifications, we are willing to pay top market rates.
Performance-based bonus.
Health insurance.
Onsite collaboration with other offices.
In-house and need-based professional trainings.
Flexible working hours and European standard vacation policy.
Team events.
No dress-code.

job_title: Middle UX/UI Designer - HN - Dự Án Chứng Khoán
job_description:
Design user flows, wireframes, mockups, prototypes, and design systems for both web and mobile trading/investment applications.
Conduct user research to analyze behavior, habits, and needs; define user journeys that align with business goals.
Collaborate with Product Managers, Business Analysts, and Engineers to translate user needs into compliant, high-performing solutions.
Ensure usability, accessibility, and security standards are consistently applied to financial applications.
Analyze usage data and feedback to continuously optimize the user experience.
Research emerging design trends, propose innovative ideas, and effectively communicate them to stakeholders and team members.
Mentor junior designers and contribute to building a strong UX culture across the team.
job_requirements:
2-5 years of UX design experience, including at least 1-2 years in FinTech, banking, or securities trading platforms.
Strong portfolio demonstrating ability to design complex workflows (e.g., account opening, stock trading, portfolio management).
Proficiency with design tools such as Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD, InVision, Illustrator.
Deep understanding of user psychology in financial decision-making.
Experience with data visualization, trading dashboards, and real-time systems is a strong plus.
Excellent communication skills in English and/or Vietnamese.
Preferred Qualifications
Knowledge of stock market operations, trading regulations, or financial compliance.
Familiarity with front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
Experience working in Agile/Scrum development environments.
job_benefits:
Attractive compensation & salary
13th month salary bonus
12 days annual leave, sick days leave per year
Social Insurance and health insurance according to Government regulation
Great allowances (lunch, parking, birthday, happy hours....)
Salary review one time per year based on employee's performance and contribution
Truly opening spirit. Everyone is be respected, you have the freedom to pursue and achieve your goals
Other benefits as per stated in Vietnamese Labor Law
International Securities and Fintech Projects
